altername_name: Wo auf der Welt Ist Carmen Sandiego: Das Geheimnis am Ende der Welt
Where in the World is Carmen Sandiego? Mystery at the End of the World
Donde esta Carmen Sandiego? - Misterio en el Fin del Mundo
Mais Ou Se Cache Carmen Sandiego: Mystere au Bout du Monde
name: Mais où se cache Carmen Sandiego? Mystère au bout du monde
overview: But where is Carmen Sandiego? Mystery at the End of the World on DS is a fun educational game in which you will have to overcome the pitfalls of this devilishly agile robber. In the shoes of Julia or Adam, find three great treasures of humanity stolen by Carmen. Go to the four corners of the world and combine action and reflection to solve the puzzles. Also adopt the right tone to interview witnesses and complete investigations.
